page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.......
page.content: ON MANY OTHERS TOO! AT WEEKENDS WE SOMETIMES GO OUT OR HELP OR PLAY IN THE GARDEN.I LIKE SCHOOL .MY FAVOURITE SUBJECTS ARE MATHS AND CREATIVE WRITING. MY BEDROOM IS SMALL.I SLEEP IN A BUNKBED WHICH MY DAD MADE FOR ME. I HAVE SEVERAL FRIENDS IN SCHOOL WHO I PLAY WITH VIRTUALLY EVERY PLAYTIME.MY BEST FRIEND IS GARETH ELLIS.WE SIT TOGETHER AT SCHOOL. {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SUSAN ROBINSON I NORMALLY GET UP AT ANY TIME AFTER QUARTER TO 8.THEN I GO DOWN TO OUR KITCHEN AND EAT MY BREAKFAST.I HAVE TOAST AND JAM.WHEN I HAVE FINISHED MY BREAKFAST I HAVE A WASH AND BRUSH MY TEETH.AFTER I GET DRESSED INTO MY SCHOOL UNIFORM WHICH IS A BLUE BLOUSE,GREY SKIRT AND JUMPER AND A BLUE & WHITE TIE.THEN I LEAVE THE HOUSE.
